title: Create shared/eventstore/ for unified AgentEvent JSONL
description: Create shared/eventstore/ package. EventStore struct with Open(sessionDir), Append(AgentEvent), Read() []AgentEvent, Tail(ctx) <-chan AgentEvent, Close(). One JSONL file per session in h2's session directory. AgentMonitor will write every event here. Peek will read from here instead of agent-native logs.
